    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public boolean addItem(Item item)
        Adds an item object to its relevant table in the database. The item must be a valid subclass of Item. Returns true if the item has been added, or false if the item has not been added because it already exists.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to be added to the database.
        Returns:
        whether the item has successfully been added to the database.
        See Also:
        Item

      • updateItem

        public void updateItem(Item item)
        Updates an item object in its relevant table in the database. The item must be a valid subclass of Item.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to be updated in the database.
        See Also:
        Item

      • deleteItem

        public void deleteItem(Item item)
        Deletes an item object from its relevant table in the database. The item must be a valid subclass of Item.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to be deleted from the database.
        See Also:
        Item

      • alreadyExists

        public boolean alreadyExists(Item item)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks whether an item object already exists in its relevant table in the database. The item must be a valid subclass of Item. Returns true if the item already exists in the database, or false if it does not.

        This method uses the Item's uniqueString method to check whether an existing row exists with the same data.

        Parameters:
        item - the item to check if it already exists in the database.
        Returns:
        whether the item already exists in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - an error when connecting to the database.
        See Also:
        Item

      • tableNameForItem

        public java.lang.String tableNameForItem(Item item)
        Returns the name of the table in which the Item relates to. The item must be a valid subclass of Item with a valid 'ItemType'.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to be checked.
        Returns:
        the name of the table.
        See Also:
        Item
